channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Fly Tipping blowing into Wymans Brook, 20th October
item.description:
Fly tipping blowing into Wymans Brook causing an environmental problem and blowing into the car park in tenants areas.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Wymans Court, Wymans Brook, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Water drain blocked by leaf fall at the end of Cox's way GL45LF, 20th October
item.description:
There are 2 water drains at the above location. The large volume of leaf fall is covering the drain on the right side if you are facing the end of the cul de sac.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Cox's Way, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Drain blocked causing flooding, 20th October
item.description:
Hello the drain outside number 2 is blocked. I have reported this time and time again. Still the same issue. I was told a few years ago there is a problem much further down the pipe when someone put a camera down there. The issue still hasnâ€™t been fixed down the line. The flooding is getting worse. I have kept it free of mud and leaves. Needs to be investigated fully instead just clearing the mud and the problem continuing. I would this looked into. Our house nearly got flooded when we had heavy rain a few weeks back.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 1, Liddington Road, Leckhampton, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
